test.title: The Infi Test
test.subtitle: A quick check to see if you're roughly following The Infi Way. A sort of Joel Test.

checks.question: Are you running automatic builds with tests?
Can you automatically deploy to production?
Does the team pick fitting technology?
Does the team pick a fitting process?
Is work refined before it's being done?
Are outages noticed and handled proactively?
Is knowledge actively shared within- and outside of the team?

test.note: We aim for the maximum score, though sometimes you still have to work towards it.
